attributes.action: offer a Knighthood to Mr. Gareth Hesketh
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
for services to the curry industry of this Country. Improvement of race relations and sustaining the sale of beer wine and spirits.

Gareth has been instrumental in maintaining the curry industry and has single handedly kept a number of off licences and curry houses in business with his request for "one more beer please".

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
